bibl.title: Papyrologica IV
bibl.publisher: Center for Classical Studies at the Institute of Philosophy of the Czech Academy of Sciences
bibl.seg: Prague, Centre for Classical Studies - Institute of Philosophy of the Czech Academy of Sciences, 2016, 280 pp., figg.

P. Eirene IV, 1-47 (dont 1 numéro double) [fait suite à P. Eirene III = Eirene 46 (2010)]. - 48 papyrus des collections de Berlin, Prague, Vienne et Florence (Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana, Istituto Papirologico "G. Vitelli"). - Pp. 17-18: Hermann Harrauer & Rosario Pintaudi, Vorbemerkung; - 277-290: Indices.
C.R. par Peter van Minnen, BASP 55 (2018) pp. 329-332.
